assistantContext: My name is Alex. I work as a software developer focused on backend systems and distributed services. I enjoy building reliable systems, reading about software architecture, and maintaining a disciplined but sustainable routine. Lately I feel mentally scattered due to context switching and want to regain consistency and focus in my daily work.

testData.What habit, routine or area of your life: I want to build a consistent deep work routine.
testData.Why is it important for you to work on t: I want to produce better code and feel less drained.
testData.Have you already tried to build or maint: I tried time blocking but kept skipping it.
testData.How would you like to approach the proce: Start small and add one block per week.
testData.Which approach suits you best: progressi: Progressive and smooth works better for me.
testData.Do you have any environment, person or p: My home office in the morning helps a lot.
testData.What thought or emotion usually makes yo: Feeling overwhelmed makes me quit quickly.
